alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cumberland; Coastal Waldo; Coastal York; Knox; Lincoln; Sagadahoc (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued June 15 at 3:16AM EDT until June 16 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...High astronomical tides will bring water levels to near minor flood stage. * WHERE...In New Hampshire, Coastal Rockingham County. In Maine, Coastal Waldo, Coastal Cumberland, Sagadahoc, Lincoln, Knox and Coastal York Counties. * WHEN...11 PM Tonight through 2 AM Thursday. * IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Hampton Harbor NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.0 ft, Moderate 12.0 ft, Major 13.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 15/01 PM 9.4 -0.1 0.5 2 None 16/01 AM 10.9 1.4 0.3 1-2 None 16/02 PM 9.1 -0.4 0.2 2 None 17/02 AM 10.7 1.2 0.2 2-3 None 17/03 PM 9.4 -0.1 0.5 2 None Seavey Island / Portsmouth NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 12.5 ft, Major 13.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.7 ft, Moderate 3.7 ft, Major 4.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 15/01 PM 9.1 0.3 0.5 2 None 16/01 AM 10.7 1.9 0.4 2 None 16/02 PM 8.9 0.1 0.2 2-3 None 17/02 AM 10.5 1.7 0.2 3 None 17/03 PM 9.1 0.3 0.5 2 None Portland ME MLLW Categories - Minor 12.0 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 14.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.3 ft, Moderate 3.3 ft, Major 4.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 15/12 PM 10.3 0.6 0.5 1 None 16/01 AM 12.1 2.4 0.4 1 Minor 16/01 PM 10.0 0.3 0.2 1-2 None 17/02 AM 11.8 2.1 0.3 3-4 None 17/02 PM 10.4 0.7 0.6 3 None Boothbay Harbor ME MLLW Categories - Minor 13.0 ft, Moderate 14.0 ft, Major 15.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 3.3 ft, Moderate 4.3 ft, Major 5.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 15/12 PM 10.0 0.3 0.5 1 None 16/12 AM 11.7 2.0 0.4 1 None 16/01 PM 9.8 0.1 0.2 1-2 None 17/01 AM 11.5 1.8 0.3 3-4 None 17/02 PM 10.1 0.4 0.6 3 None &&
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
